tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very good and experienced. Gums were paining so much no today gums are very good and teeth are also good.

Being new to Mumbai, I was very apprehensive about visiting a Dentist, as I was comfortable with only my former practitioner I have been associated with for years. Hence, when the need to find someone to fix a lost crown from an RCT arose, I was faced with a huge and tough choice to make. I am a very demanding and quality conscious person and when it comes to health, nothing but the best will do. I was looking for a great professional with work ethics that met all my requirements, topmost on my list was hygiene as you do not go to a Doctor to pick up an illness you do not have right?! 
After a lot of searching online, and an appointment I made and walked out on due to poor work ethics that instantly broke my trust, my daughter found Dent Heal. My search and all my fears ended here as Dr Viraj Kakade is a perfect professional and runs his clinic with great standards. Everything from fixing the appointment, to the consultation, the actual procedure and the advice for the future was done in the most comforting , clean manner with zero stress for the patient. 
I am certainly glad to have found him here, and also had the opportunity to meet his gentle and pleasant wife who is his professional partner too. I wish them a great future in all their endeavours and would safely recommend them to others in need of dental treatments.
Do keep up the great work!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
My scheduled appointment was with Dr Viraj Kakade. But I ended up meeting Dr Rati. Very pleasant persona, efficient and a wonderful Professional. And definitely, a good word for the support staff.
Wouldn't hesitate to recommend her.
Overall..a 5-star experience!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the best Dental clinic in Juhu. Dr. Darshana and Dr. Viraj were very professional and friendly during the whole procedure. I felt no pain at all. They guided me how to take care after surgery and precautions to take. Overall very nice experience. Recommended to visit.

I visited Dent Heal for the first time, I was searching for a good dentist to get my teeth whitening done, I met Dr.viraj he explained me the whole procedure, & I agreed to get it done from him, very satisfied with the result, my teeths are 3 shades whiter then before, thank u doc :-)

Very glad to have found a doctor working on a Sunday, I'm very pleased with the quality of the service and treatment provided to me at dent heal, they have a very good team and they make sure the patient is comfortable throughout. Highly recommended..

I got veneers done from Dr. Viraj. The result was way better than my expectation. 
He explained the entire procedure from the beginning to the end before starting the treatment. 
I had a few issues with my temporary veneers, but it was taken care of. 
Well maintained and clean clinic. 

Dr. Darshana, was also very friendly and helpful during the entire procedure. 

I would strongly recommend Dent Heal to everyone.

I came to Dent Heal for a full mouth rehabilitation.
I was very scared and apprehensive about how my body would take to the treatment .

I was explained about each step in a  pre and post procedure patient interaction. Even though I could not visualise the end result and final look but Dr. Viraj Kakade's complete confidence and professionalism in his work made it fell like a cake walk.

I am completely thrilled about the final outcome  and would recommend him hands down to any and every patient.
I got an extraction done from Dr.Viraj, his hand is so good that I just did not feel pain or rather anything at all during the entire procedure. Recommended!

I had a very bad teeth which was not cleaned , due to which my gums got infection and it got inflamed.. I was having a lot of bleeding and pain.. Thanks to Dr.viraj.. He had done a mucogingival surgery and treated me so well..

I have a complain of false denture.. I consulted many dentist.. But none could give me my desired results.. Thanks to Dr.viraj who gave me fixed prosthesis and relieved all my problems..
Excellent ambience , ***** ******* and very good supporting team. Dr. Viraj's did a fantastic job on my dental issues, very ably supported by his team including Dr.Darshana and Dr. Gauraja.
It was good getting treated by Dr.viraj as he delivers what he promises and really has a very good hand in making smiles.thank you
This was my first visit to dentist and I really like the way I was been treated I didn't feel the pain at all. Thanks Dr.Viraj.
I had a lot of pain in my tooth which was unbearable.. Thanks to Dr. Viraj who took care of me on an off day.. I relieved me from pain..

I had a lot of gaps in my teeth and I didn't wanted to go through the pain of orthodontics.. Thanks to Dr. Viraj who gave me a better options and closed all the gaps in my teeth.. I m so grateful to him..

My old metal ceramic crown was done very bad and it was very bad esthetic.. Thanks to Dr. Viraj who have considered my problem into notice. And gave me veneers .. I m so happy with d esthetics.. It looks lyk natural teeth.
I had n number of treatments to undergo with, and I was too confused.. Thanks to Dr. Viraj who guided me properly and took my priorities into notice.. I m very thankful.

I came here with an expectation of getting the teeth removed but here Dr. Viraj convinced me to save the tooth and get a root canal treatment done. I'm really relived of pain and thankful for the treatment done.
It was very nice been at dent heal the doctors treated me too well absent of any pain during the treatment ....thank you.
I came to dent heal after reading some very good reviews on the practo site,I was quite satisfied with the work and the doctors, will surely recommend them.
I visited Dent Heal for my fillings, got my fillings done from Dr.Viraj. he did my filling's very well can't make out, now my teeth are cavity free :-)  Thank u doc!
I got my scaling done from Dr.Viraj, he has a really smooth set of hands! Was so comfortable during the entire time & so happy with result! Will recommend him to others for sure!
I got my ceramic crown made from Dr.Viraj, very comfortable the entire procedure was. I'm very happy with the result, looks good & feels absolutely normal!
Got my front cap done from Dr.Viraj, can't make out the difference from my other teeth, its so good! Glad I got it done from him!
Dr. Viraj  extracted my tooth, with absolutely no pain & comfort! I didnt realize it all , it was so good! Very skilled set of hands!
I visited Dent Heal to change my metal fillings with the tooth coloured fillings because I didn't like the way they looked, happy with the result!

I visit Dent Heal for my fillings, Dr Viraj did my fillings. He is a very polite and friendly, he explained me the whole procedure in detail...& he take care of all my fillings...very satisfied with his work...recommended!
I got all my dental work done at Dent Heal, Dr.Viraj did an amazing job! My root canal was painless & the caps fit perfectly! Really happy
Came to Dr rati for replacement of my old crowns, was very happy with the overall work and the crown was done perfectly..thnk u Dr rati
Dr.Viraj made a ceramic crown for me & I am not able to tell the artificial from the real teeth, so happy with the outcome! Recommend him to all!
Got my crowns placed from Dr.Viraj at Dent Heal, so delighted with the job done, unable to make out that I have a artificial tooth, recommended!
I got my fillings done from Dr.Viraj. He has such an amazing hand, so gentle that I didn't feel anything at all, was so comfortable, really content!
I came to Dr.Viraj for my fillings ,he did a very good job considering I did not have any pain or discomfort, surely recommended to all
Dr.Viraj did my bleaching, so happy with the result, was so comfortable throughout the treatment! Definitely recommend Dent Heal to everyone!
Very good Dr will recommended to all my family and friends nicely did my work very patience Dr viraj is...thnkx doc for the nice treatment:)

Excellent and timely service provided.

Patiently attended all the problems. 

Feels like being in safe and sound hands.

Immediate effect noticed.

Highly recommended doctor for all your dental problems.
I came to Dr. Viraj at Dent Heal after visiting a few dentists & am very satisfied with him & will get done my future dental work from him.
I was paranoid about root canals till I got one done from Dr Viraj .... Thanks doc & all the best to Dent Heal
Came for replacement of a missing tooth and Dr viraj gave me an excellent treatment option which was way cheaper n convenient as compared to what other dentists had suggested.
Dr viraj rectified a wrong root canal done by a dentist in Delhi, he was very good at his work and did a perfect job.
I'm very scared of dental visits but Dr Viraj made me feel totally at ease throughout my treatment..very professional and a very good hand..thnk u doc.
Nice clinic at a very convenient location..Dr viraj knows his stuff and the treatment was spot on...really happy and satisfied..

Good experience at dent heal, professional and prompt service..
We are being well treated full attention is given by Dr viraj
Very awesome and comforting. Excellent mastery and know how
Dr viraj has made very good dentures for me...I can now eat most of the things
I am happy to get my tooth treatment done frm Dr Viraj .
Very professional and experienced dentist. Would definitely recommend.

Xtremly well equipped, clean and hygenic clinic... Handled the entire procedure well and seemed to know exactly what he was doing... 

A GOOD DENTIST ....Well mannered and polite 

Charges were quite reasonable too
Definitely recommend Dr.Viraj to everyone!
